content.raw: Minor detail: This default case is going to be hard to cover by our coverage tests. If we want to increase the coverage we could remove it, although is a little bit more defensive if we leave it. If in the future we add a new type to `CoordinateType` and we forget to add a block for the new type in this function, the error will show up. Up to you.
